column4: can anyone tell me of a media manager that will pull the metadata │ adaptr
| and rename my music file names, having an issue with pulling      │ ader10

can anyone tell me of a media manager that will rename my music file names by pulling the info from the metadata.. im having issues with getting my music off of my ipod. all the file names are .. garbage.
That's because iTunes encrypts them when its added to your iPod. I honestly have no idea why.
